OAuth::disableSSLChecks

(PECL OAuth >= 0.99.5)

OAuth::disableSSLChecks — Turn off SSL checks

Description

public bool OAuth::disableSSLChecks ( void )

Turns off the usual SSL peer certificate and host checks, this is not for production environments.

Parameters

This function has no parameters.

Return Values

Returns TRUE on success or FALSE on failure.

See Also

  • OAuth::enableSSLChecks - Turn on SSL checks
